alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 2:57AM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and gusty winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 55 mph at times. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge, and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Through 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, particularly with strong crosswinds. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
